{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits, class Allocator &gt;
void swap( std::basic_syncbuf&lt;CharT, Traits, Allocator&gt;&amp; lhs,
           std::basic_syncbuf&lt;CharT, Traits, Allocator&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::basic_syncbuf}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{lc|std::basic_syncbuf}} objects whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
